# Dropdown

Dropdowns can be used with a dataitem's lookup like so:

{
  "name": "CountryList",
  "items": [
    {
      "label": "United Arab Emirates",
      "value": "UAE"
    },
    {
      "label": "United Kingdom",
      "value": "UK"
    },
    {
      "label": "United States",
      "value": "USA"
    }
  ]
}
{
  "Country": null
}
  <dropdown :items="dataitems.Country.lookup.items" v-model="records.Country"></dropdown>
1
